Articles.Content:
Some of you may not know what a text adventure is, but here's a small example. Say minecraft.

There is a tree near you.

> in this case the command you would enter would be 'punch tree'. Got it?......

Well, here goes nothing.

Lets start off a KSP text adventure, where you follow on from the user above. Try to limit your entries to around 100 words so everyone can have a go.

Right, I'll start.

You're in the VAB. You build a three stage landing, capable of achieving circular orbit around kerbin, landing on the mun, and returning to land on kerbin. The total Delta V is 3500m/s, you have 500 electric charge, with solar panels ready to deploy, and the ship has a crew of 4. The ship is on the Launchpad and awaiting take-off.
You put full throttle and you hit spacebar and the rocket explodes, you return to the VAB to fix the problem.

You turn the rocket into a 12 stage interplanetary spaceship. The ship has a total of 75000m/s of Delta V. You add some docking ports to create spaceship in faraway orbits. You go to the Launchpad, and ready the ship for takeoff.
The rocket starts tipping over, so you revert to the VAB, save the ship, and head over to the SPH.

You build a concord plane equivalent and take it to the runway. You put the brakes on the wheels, set the engines to full throttle then fire up the engines. Your release the brakes and go speeding down the runway at 5000m/s. You are about to it the end of the runway when the plan suddenly jerks upwards and shoots into the sky. Jeb is scared.
The plane quickly reduces speed due to atmospheric friction. The plane is now safely at 15,000 metres.

Then a jet flameout occur and you loose control and your plane is falling towards Kerbin's surface, Jeb is now happy and you decide to scrub the mission, when Jeb abandons his plane, you press "R" and you use the jetpack to slow down, but you haven't enough time and Jeb and the plane expldode.
Somehow, the command pod survives the crash, and bill and bob get out of the command pod, and slowly make their way toward the Launchpad.
You walk away from the computer for a few hours with the game at full phys warp and a credit card holding down the W key.
You un-warp the game, and your cheap stayputnik sat expirences "Rapid Unplanned vessle disassembly"
You exit to the space center and recover its science.
You obeserve the result and realise that the "mystery goo" is an alien race because it is feeling home around Minmus
You BURN TEH ALIENS!!!!!! 'MURICUH!!!
Like insects, It releases a pheremone that somehow travels back to minmus, and the alien goo begins to wage war on your racist planet.
You saw mystery goo falling from the heaven

You saw mystery goo falling from the heaven

You dide and respawn in the astronaut complex
You realized you shouldn't have been racist and now regret your decision

You realized you shouldn't have been racist and now regret your decision

you use the lazor weopens pack 2k nuke missile and blow up everything
You decide to start anew and try to go to the Mun again. You strap 150 SRBs onto your Concorde and press "Launch" on the runway, hoping you'll have enough delta V to make it to the Mun.
Finaly you realise that you had too much power and find yourself on a sol escape orbit
Waiting for the slow release of death. the space kraken decides to be ironic.

You exit the solar system and say:

-What went wrong?

Then you return to the VAB and realize that MechJeb told you that the rocket was way too powerful.
>You tone down the power of the rocket, and launch it
